Container.Name: whallin-pgvecto-rs15
Container.Overview: Based on pgvecto-rs 15: pgvecto.rs is a Postgres extension that provides vector similarity search functions.

Config.Name: pgvecto-rs port
Config.Description: The TCP port pgvecto-rs listens on.

Config.Name: pgvecto-rs storage
Config.Description: The location where pgvecto-rs stores its data.

Config.Name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
Config.Description: This variable sets the pgvecto-rs superuser password.

Config.Name: POSTGRES_USER
Config.Description: This variable creates a superuser and a database with the same name.

Config.Name: POSTGRES_DB
Config.Description: This variable can define a different name for the default database created on the first start.

Config.Name: PGDATA
Config.Description: This variable defines a subdirectory for the database files.
